title: Darkstream: jumping on the Trump Train
author: VD
content_html:
Tonight at 8 PM Eastern I’ll be doing a darkstream to discuss the correct response to those belatedly jumping on the Trump Train.

UPDATE: the replay is here.

OVERHEARD ON GAB: Some members of the family were making rude comments about Trump. Hubby asked why they didn’t like the god emperor? It shut down the conversation for a while. Then more negative comments with same question. Stopped them again as they just couldn’t handle it. Worked a treat.


Boom and pound while you shut ’em down in the name of the God-Emperor!
